Articles.Content:
Been having problems ever since 1.3 came out. I've got about a dozen mods, have identified several that are causing problems. I seem to have 4 parts that are not loaded into the game. These are:

1) utilityCabin

2) adapter-375-25

3) KAXelectricprop

4) mk3-9pod

The list above is exactly what shows up under the Vessel Loading Error box once the Space Center is loaded. I'm already pretty certain that the 'utilityCabin' and the 'mk3-9pod' are the PPD-24 Itinerant Service Container and the Mk3-9 Orbital Command Pod respectively. These are both from the NearFutureSpacecraft mod, which I do have the latest version of. So this eludes me as to why they aren't loading. I have not been able to identify the adapter-375-25 part yet, however I do not believe that it is a large adapter, because one of the vessels containing it is of a smaller scale. (So I don't think it is an adapter from 3.75m to 2.5m, but again, not 100% sure). Lastly, the KAXelectricprop is obviously the electric prop from the mod KAX. This mod has been a problem for me, as I have identified it as the cause of the game crashing upon load-up. The mod is not currently updated, however I find it hard that because it is not updated, it makes the entire game crash. So maybe it's something else, I don't know. Is there a way to manually copy a part (like the electric prop) and place it in another mod so that the part loads? Any help would be much appreciated. 

 

Thanks!
